select count(X.id) from ( select , GROUP_CONCAT(C.id) role_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(C.`name`) role_name from user_info A left join map_user_role B on A.id = B.user_id left join role_info C on B.role_id = C.id
GROUP BY A.id order by A.create_time desc ) X

select , GROUP_CONCAT(C.id) role_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(C.`name`) role_name from user_info A left join map_user_role B on A.id = B.user_id left join role_info C on B.role_id = C.id
GROUP BY A.id order by A.create_time desc limit #{entity.offset}, #{entity.limit}
mapper.sql: A.id, A.`name`, A.nick_name, A.`password`, A.salt, A.avatar, A.phone, A.sex, A.description, A.last_login_time, A.login_times, A.create_user, A.create_time, A.`status`

where A.status = 1
